divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside for a smoke and I looked up in the sky looking south and I noticed a flash in the sky, I looked more closely at the object and it was shaped like a triangle. The back of it looked like it was on fire and it streaked down towards Lake Superior going west really fast and then I lost sight of it because of the trees. It was going to go right into Lake Superior if it kept it course that I saw it was on. Then about two minutes after I lost sight of it, two F18's were out circling around where I last seen the object. Then three more planes showed up about five minutes after I had last seen the object. The five planes then just circled around like they were looking for something. The five planes flew around for about 20 minutes then a larger plane like a 30 passenger jet flew over the top of them going east and the five F18's followed the larger jet and left the area. I waited for about 25 minutes and kept looking over the lake, but I didn't see anything.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Two Harbors
There were no other sightings in Two Harbors on or around January 10th 2008
Summary: I saw a flash in the sky, then a triangle shaped ship streaked accross the sky over the western part of Lake Superior.
